page.shortlink: api desktop api browse objects get function
page.description: The BROWSE_OBJECTS_GET() function returns a list of the columns, object hierarchy, on a browse layout.

prototypes.prototype: Object_List as C = BROWSE_OBJECTS_GET(C Browsename[,C library[,C prefix[,C classprefix]])

argument.name: Browsename
argument.description: The name of a saved browse layout. Character

section.title: Example
section.example: ? browse_objects_get("CustomerBrowse") = Customer Id Last Name First Name Company Phone Number Fax Number
